channel.title: Help Adding Thieving Stalls
channel.description: So thieving works in the server like taking from npcs, but i was wondering how can i make stalls work because all the stalls i have dont work and dont do anything, im useing a 317 and the snippets ive seen arnt working so i want to make crafting stall work and give a gem but how do i add this?
